title: Introduction to Web3
description: Understand the evolution from Web1 to Web3, its core principles, and why it matters.
content:
Module 1: Overview of Web1, Web2, and Web3
- Decentralization, Trustless Systems, and Ownership
- Key technologies powering Web3
- Web3 vs Traditional Web Applications

title: Blockchain Fundamentals
description: Learn the underlying technology that powers Web3: Blockchain.
content:
Module 2: How Blockchains Work
- Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT)
- Consensus Mechanisms: PoW vs PoS
- Smart Contracts and Token Standards (ERC-20, ERC-721)

title: Smart Contract Development with Solidity
description: Start building smart contracts using the Solidity programming language.
content:
Module 3: Introduction to Solidity
- Data Types, Functions, and Events
- Contract Lifecycle and Storage
- Writing, Compiling, and Deploying Smart Contracts

title: Ethereum and EVM-based Chains
description: Explore Ethereum as the primary smart contract platform and learn about compatible networks.
content:
Module 4: Ethereum Deep Dive
- The Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM)
- Gas, Transactions, and Blocks
- Layer 2 Solutions and Sidechains

title: Building DApps with Web3.js and Ethers.js
description: Connect your frontend to blockchain using JavaScript libraries.
content:
Module 5: Decentralized Applications (DApps)
- Web3.js and Ethers.js Setup
- Interacting with Smart Contracts
- Wallet Integration (e.g., MetaMask)

title: IPFS and Decentralized Storage
description: Learn how to store and retrieve files on decentralized storage systems like IPFS.
content:
Module 6: Storing Data on IPFS
- Installing and Using IPFS
- Hashing and Pinning Files
- Integrating IPFS with DApps
